tool_description: Identifies duplicate files based on content hash comparison, file size, or name patterns, grouping duplicates together for review.

file_paths.description: Array of file paths to check for duplicates

detection_method.description: Method to detect duplicates: hash, size, name, size_and_name

hash_algorithm.description: Hash algorithm for content comparison: md5, sha1, sha256

ignore_extensions.description: Whether to ignore file extensions when comparing names

min_file_size.description: Minimum file size in bytes to include in duplicate detection

case_sensitive_names.description: Whether name comparison is case sensitive

exclude_empty_files.description: Whether to exclude zero-byte files from duplicate detection

max_file_size_mb.description: Maximum file size in MB to process (1-1000)

quick_scan.description: Use quick scanning (size + partial hash) for large files

group_by_directory.description: Group duplicate results by parent directory

error_messages: Insufficient files: At least 2 files are required for duplicate detection.
Invalid detection method: Use one of [hash, size, name, size_and_name].
Invalid hash algorithm: Use one of [md5, sha1, sha256].
Invalid file size limits: min_file_size must be >= 0, max_file_size_mb must be between 1 and 1000.
File access error: Cannot read one or more files for duplicate detection.
Hash calculation failed: Unable to calculate hash for one or more files.
Memory limit exceeded: Too many large files for duplicate detection.
usage: Provide file_paths array and detection_method. Configure hash algorithm, size limits, name comparison options, and performance settings. Returns groups of duplicate files found.

duplicate_groups.description: Array of duplicate file group identifiers with file paths

total_duplicates.description: Total number of duplicate files found

unique_files.description: Number of files with no duplicates

space_wasted.description: Total disk space consumed by duplicate files in bytes

detection_summary.description: Summary of duplicate detection results and method used
